about_the_game:
Launch the haggle ball towards the bricks and rack up a major discount on your ingredient! The faster you negotiate, the better the deal you’ll get -- but all your fast talking might backfire and drive the price back up if you don’t prevent the ball from hitting your goal.

When the time limit is up -- All Sales Final -- you can either try to re-negotiate all over or you can just bite the bullet and take it at the price you negotiated.

  • Try to get the best deal possible and make the ultimate discount chili!
  • Collect power ups to help you on your journey.
  • If you haggle well enough, the shopkeeper may even pay you for their ingredients!

short_description: It’s 4 o’ clock, it’s time to get some chili! Our floppy protagonist is on his way to the market to get the ingredients he needs to make a nice bowl of chili going -- on a budget. He’ll have to engage in the ancient art of Haggle Ball!
